name: PROBLEM_TREAT_SUMM_AUDIT
description: This table stores treatment summary audit information for a problem.

columns.name: PROBLEM_LIST_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the problem record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: TX_SUMM_AUDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: The user who marked a problem as needing or not needing treatment summary.

columns.name: TX_SUMM_AUDIT_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: TX_SUMM_AUDIT_DTTM
columns.description: The UTC instant when a problem is marked as needing or not needing treatment summary.

columns.name: TX_SUMM_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value of audit action.
